translator.Printer
Class CodeBlock

java.lang.Object
  translator.Printer.CodeBlock

public class CodeBlock
extends java.lang.Object

A class that formats code blocks nicely and is capable of nesting. This class caches all of its output in a StringBuffer so that it doesn't print anything when its methods are called. Rather, it must be passed to CodePrinter, which will then direct the code output to the proper location (stdout, a file, etc).
